Source.Name: serve-d
Source.Summary: D LSP server (dlang language server protocol server)
Source.Description: Microsoft language server protocol implementation for D. This program is the heart of code-d and implements most IDE features in D. The purpose of this project is to give every editor the same capabilities and editing features as code-d through the widely available Microsoft Language Server Protocol (LSP).
